ctx: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq. unfold union_mpl_0. unfold union_mpl_0 in Hmap. destruct s. - simpl in Hmap. rewrite Hmap. reflexivity. - destruct (a =? a0)%N eqn:Heq. + injection Heq as Heq'. subst. rewrite Hmap. reflexivity. + apply mpl_compat_7 in Hmap. rewrite Hmap. reflexivity.
